ProjectTitle: FRET-type remote excitation tip-enhanced fluorescence microscopy for super-resolution DNA mapping
InitialFeedbackHistory:
08/09/2023
The content of your DMP looks good and contains the information asked by FWO but it does not follow their template. For your final DMP that FWO expects as part of your final report please use either the new Flemish standard template that was introduced last year, you can find this DMPonline.be, or use the template that FWO used for projects starting between 2018 and 2022 that you can find here in the attachment. You can find the FWO DMP requirements here: https://www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan/
label: good with suggestions
